mapper.select: SELECT c.id,shop_item_id,shop_id,amount,s.name as shop_item_name,price,shop.name as shop_name from cart c LEFT JOIN shop_item s on c.shop_item_id = s.id left join shop on shop.id = s.shop_id where c.user_id = #{userId}
select * from cart t where id=#{params.id} and name=#{params.name}
